title: Map.entry() factory
summary: Create map entries with a clean factory method.
explanation: Map.entry() replaces the verbose AbstractMap.SimpleEntry constructor. It returns an immutable entry, making it ideal for Map.ofEntries() and stream operations.

whyModernWins.title: Concise
whyModernWins.desc: One line instead of three with a clearer intent.

whyModernWins.title: Immutable
whyModernWins.desc: The returned entry cannot be modified.

whyModernWins.title: Composable
whyModernWins.desc: Works perfectly with Map.ofEntries() for large maps.
